description: This file defines an 'Intro' page component for a LightningJS application, displaying a title, welcome card, and start button, with navigation logic to move to the quiz page.

classes.name: Component
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing the intro page

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes the component state with layout, colors, and text properties

methods.name: components
methods.description: Returns the child components used in the template

methods.name: onReady
methods.description: Sets up the button press handler to navigate to the quiz page
